p: For the 16 remaining EOs, a positive relation was observed between mortality and concentration. Most of them showed a zero or almost zero mortality at a concentration of 1% except A. sativum which still provoked 75% of mortality after 24 h at that concentration and represents therefore the most toxic oil tested. Among the remaining oil, G. procumbens, O. sanctum and Eucalyptus dives reached respectively 81%, 68% and 51% of mortality (24 h) for a 2% concentration ( Table 3).
